name: Multidimensional (Morchul, DarkRhino)
description:
Multidimensional is a 2d space adventure game where you lead a spaceship through another dimension.

Starting as a simple space miner who is looking for resources in space you soon find something mystical which confuses your senses and let you see unreal things.

To play the game unzip the .zip and run the Multidimensional.exe
